Package semsim.utilities

Class ErrorLog

java.lang.Object
semsim.utilities.ErrorLog
public class ErrorLog
extends java.lang.Object
Class for storing errors that may occur when processing models and associated data
Author:
mneal

    • addError

      public static void addError​(java.lang.String e, java.lang.Boolean isfatal, boolean addtologfilewriter)
      Add an error to the error log
      Parameters:
      e - An error message
      isfatal - Whether the error is fatal
      addtologfilewriter - Whether to add to this object's PrintWriter

      public static boolean errorsAreFatal()
      Returns:
      Whether any errors in the log are fatal

    • getAllErrorsandFlush

      public static java.util.ArrayList<ErrorEntry> getAllErrorsandFlush()
      Returns:
      List of all errors in the log (function also clears the error log)
